biography: Mark Isaacson was a lifelong resident of Fairbanks, Alaska. He dabbled in acting while in high school and college at the University of Alaska, Fairbanks. He never pursued the arts in his adulthood, working first in nursing and then switching over into accounting. He died from surgery complications at the age of 36 at Fairbanks Memorial Hospital, leaving behind a daughter Emma.
name: Mark Isaacson
